thread.title: Lin-Manuel Miranda Was In Britney Spears' 2008 Documentary "For The Record" And You May Have Totally Missed It
thread.title_full: Lin-Manuel Miranda Was In Britney Spears' 2008 Documentary "For The Record" And You May Have Totally Missed It

author: Lindsay Farber
title: Lin-Manuel Miranda Was In Britney Spears' 2008 Documentary "For The Record" And You May Have Totally Missed It
text:
View this image ›
MTV In case you missed it, Britney let us into her life and shed light on some ~not so fun~ stuff that happened the year prior. 2007 was terrible, but things are much better now!
ID: 10586528 2. Anyways, while I was watching the documentary for the 1,000th time, I saw something I hadn’t noticed before… ID: 10586529 3. A young, graphic-tee-wearing Lin-Manuel Miranda! View this image ›
Bruce Glikas / FilmMagic Obviously I had to rewind and do a double-take. HOW CUTE IS HE?!
ID: 10586530 4. Around halfway through the documentary, in which we also see Britney film her music video for “Womanizer,” she goes to see a new Broadway play called In the Heights . View this image ›
MTV In the Heights was the first musical that put Lin on the map, first hitting Broadway in 2008.
ID: 10586539 5. Lin not only co-created the musical, but he was the composer and acted in it as well. View this image ›
MTV ID: 10586541 6. After the show, Britney went backstage to meet a then-28-year-old Lin and took pictures with the cast. View this image ›
Bruce Glikas / FilmMagic ID: 10586552 7. Lin, whose play had only been on Broadway for a few months, was noticeably nervous while meeting Brit, and it’s so damn sweet! View this image ›
Bruce Glikas / FilmMagic ID: 10586563 View this image ›
MTV ID: 10586574 View this image ›
MTV ID: 10586581 10. After leaving, Britney talked about how much she loved the show. View this image ›
MTV ID: 10586584 11. Britney + Lin 4evr. View this image ›
Bruce Glikas / FilmMagic ID: 10586588 Check out more articles on BuzzFeed.com!
